com.kamontat.com.kamontat.model.management

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kamontat.com.kamontat.model.management.Location

  • public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
    with 2 method make the class became screen location api

    this class contain some of method but all of them is static method so you don't need to assign everything to use it

    1. getCenterLocation(Dimension)
    2. getCenterPage(Window, Window)
    Since:
    17/8/59 - 23:54

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.awt.Point getDefaultPoint
      get default point at x=0, y=0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Location() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.awt.Point getCenterLocation(java.awt.Dimension pageSize)
      get point that stay in the center of the screen
      static java.awt.Point getCenterPage(java.awt.Window oldPage, java.awt.Window newPage)
      get point to show page at center of the old page
      if don't have old page (oldPage is null) this method will return center of the screen

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • getDefaultPoint

        public static java.awt.Point getDefaultPoint
        get default point at x=0, y=0

    • Constructor Detail

      • Location

        public Location()

    • Method Detail

      • getCenterLocation

        public static java.awt.Point getCenterLocation(java.awt.Dimension pageSize)
        get point that stay in the center of the screen
        Parameters:
        pageSize - size of page that want to show in the center
        Returns:
        point of center screen (you can set in setLocation() directly)

      • getCenterPage

        public static java.awt.Point getCenterPage(java.awt.Window oldPage,
                                           java.awt.Window newPage)
        get point to show page at center of the old page
        if don't have old page (oldPage is null) this method will return center of the screen
        Parameters:
        oldPage - current page
        newPage - new page that want to show
        Returns:
        point (you can set in setLocation() directly)
